title: God is Needless, Matchless and Eternal - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: if you go to a s commune he has thousands of Europeans and westerners from all over the world when you go to his Oso commune in his samadi you know when the Hindus die they put the ashes and they make a samadi on a samadi is mentioned Oho rajnish never born never died but visited the Earth from the 11th of December 1931 to the 19th of January in 1990 never born never died but visited the Earth from the 11th of December 1931 to the 19th of January 1990 they forgot to mention in his samadi that he was not given visas to 22 different countries of the world almighty God coming to visit the world and he requires visas to go to different countries and the AR Bishop of Greece said if you don't take out rajnish and his followers from this country we burn his house and the house of his disciple and the last test the fourth test is so stringent that no one beside true Allah subhana tala can pass there's nothing like him the moment you can compare God to anything in this world he's not God
